hero.headline: Unlock Your Most Efficient Self
hero.subheadline: The all-in-one productivity platform that combines AI-powered task management, gamification, and CRM integration to help you achieve your goals faster than ever.

primaryFeatures.title: AI-Powered Task Generation
primaryFeatures.description: Let our intelligent AI create personalized tasks based on your goals, schedule, and preferences. Never run out of productive things to do.

primaryFeatures.title: CRM Integration
primaryFeatures.description: Seamlessly sync with Salesforce, HubSpot, and other CRM platforms. Turn your professional tasks into personal productivity wins.

primaryFeatures.title: Gamified Productivity
primaryFeatures.description: Earn points, unlock badges, and climb leaderboards. Make productivity addictive with our comprehensive gamification system.

secondaryFeatures.title: Streak Tracking
secondaryFeatures.description: Build lasting habits with daily streak tracking and bonus rewards.

secondaryFeatures.title: Social Feed
secondaryFeatures.description: Share achievements and stay motivated with your productivity community.

secondaryFeatures.title: Smart Analytics
secondaryFeatures.description: Track your productivity patterns and optimize your daily routine.

secondaryFeatures.title: Life Categories
secondaryFeatures.description: Organize tasks across Work, Personal, Fitness, Side Hustle, and Social.

secondaryFeatures.title: Calendar Sync
secondaryFeatures.description: Integrate with Google Calendar, Outlook, and other scheduling tools.

secondaryFeatures.title: Cross-Platform
secondaryFeatures.description: Native iOS and Android apps with real-time synchronization.

ctaSection.title: Ready to Transform Your Productivity?
ctaSection.description: Join thousands of users who have already unlocked their most efficient selves with UFFICIENT.

testimonials.name: Sarah Chen
testimonials.content: UFFICIENT completely transformed how I manage my daily tasks. The AI suggestions are incredibly accurate, and the gamification keeps me motivated throughout the day.

testimonials.name: Marcus Rodriguez
testimonials.content: The CRM integration is a game-changer. I can manage my personal goals alongside my professional targets seamlessly. The streak system keeps me consistently productive.

testimonials.name: Emily Watson
testimonials.content: As a busy entrepreneur, UFFICIENT helps me balance my side hustle, fitness goals, and personal life. The AI task generation saves me hours of planning each week.

testimonials.name: David Kim
testimonials.content: The gamification aspect makes productivity fun again. I love competing with friends on the leaderboards and unlocking new badges. It's like having a personal coach.

testimonials.name: Lisa Thompson
testimonials.content: UFFICIENT's social features create amazing accountability. Seeing my team's progress motivates me to stay on track with my own goals. The analytics are incredibly insightful.

referral.title: Invite Friends, Unlock Premium
referral.description: Share UFFICIENT with friends and family to unlock exclusive features and premium benefits.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: Have questions, feedback, or need support? We'd love to hear from you.

metadata.title: UFFICIENT - Unlock Your Most Efficient Self
